suite.name: LostAndFoundWebTests

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Create File
kw.arg: dummy content for image upload test
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

test.name: Test Case 1: Student Complete Workflow (Report -> Home -> Detail)

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Submit Form
kw.doc: Submits a form identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Is
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL is ``expected``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Report Lost Item Successfully
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Blue Backpack Lost (E2E)' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder="e.g., iPhone 13 Pro"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'xpath=(//select[@class="select-input"])[1]' by value Accessories.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//div[contains(@class, "card-title") and contains(., "Blue Backpack Lost (E2E)")]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Waits for loading to finish, scrolls to the card title, and clicks it.

test.doc: Student logs in, reports an item, is redirected to Home, sees the item card, and clicks it to view details.

test.doc: Admin reports found item, views it, marks it as returned (identification), and verifies the record in Owner List.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

kw.name: Remove File
kw.doc: Removes a file with the given path.

suite.doc: End-to-End Workflow: Student Report -> Detail, then Admin Report -> Detail -> Identification -> Owner List.
